com.mwdiamond.fansi

Class AnsiUtils.ProgressBar.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mwdiamond.fansi.AnsiUtils.ProgressBar.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    AnsiUtils.ProgressBar

    public static class AnsiUtils.ProgressBar.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for custom AnsiUtils.ProgressBar instances.

      • units

        public AnsiUtils.ProgressBar.Builder units(java.lang.String units)
        Text appended to the counter as the progress bar's units, e.g. "KB" or " tasks".
        Parameters:
        units - the units of progress to display
        Returns:
        this builder

      • usingPercent

        public AnsiUtils.ProgressBar usingPercent()
        Returns a ProgressBar that will display a percentage. Users will generally call AnsiUtils.ProgressBar.updateProgress(int) to update the percentage to display, however they can also use AnsiUtils.ProgressBar.updateSteps(int, int) to let the ProgressBar convert the current step into a percentage.

        This method simply constructs the ProgressBar, nothing is written to the console.

        Returns:
        a progress bar with an x% format

      • usingCounter

        public AnsiUtils.ProgressBar usingCounter(int initialStepCount)
        Returns a ProgressBar that will display an x/y counter after the bar. The initialStepCount can be updated later via updateSteps().

        This method simply constructs the ProgressBar, nothing is written to the console.

        Parameters:
        initialStepCount - the number of steps that will need to be taken to fill the bar
        Returns:
        a progress bar with an x/y format
